titles.title: MANAGER Act
MANAGER Act
Manager Attitudes and Notions According to Government Employee Responses Act
To require annual surveys of Federal employee managers, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Accountability.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported in the Nature of a Substitute by the Yeas and Nays: 22 - 18.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management
